rows.label: tlk45310158_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Lately no matter where you go,
there's one name you always hear:
the Hræsvelgr Mercenaries.

rows.label: tlk45310158_04_msg0002
rows.name:
If you've got a problem, leave it to the
Hræsvelgr Mercenaries, everyone says.

rows.label: tlk45310158_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Worst part is, I can't even argue.
They DO solve pretty much any
problem, and efficiently at that.

rows.label: tlk45310158_04_msg0004
rows.name:
I shudder to think how many Blades
they must have working for them.
Powerful ones they must be, too.

rows.label: tlk45310158_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Maybe it's time I headed to Invidia
myself and asked if they wouldn't
let me join up.

rows.label: tlk45310158_04_msg0006
rows.name:
The days of solo mercenary work might
be coming to an end. From here on out,
maybe it's best we all work together.
